items.title: Gerald Johnson elected to Eaton’s Board of Directors
items.description: DUBLIN, July 23, 2025--Intelligent power management company Eaton (NYSE:ETN) today announced that Gerald Johnson has been elected to the company’s Board of Directors effective July 23, 2025.
